channel.title: Creating a teleport option
channel.description: I need to know how to create a teleport option under the minigames tab. Like when you click "Minigame tele" it has one spot open. I want to fill it. Please and thank you.

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

No problem

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Thank you, Zoft! That was my problem, and you solved it! I used to be better at this stuff, but I quit for a while, and forgot some stuff, but thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Equipping them in you’re server? Are they going into your the wrong spot? If you are having the problem server-sided then edit item.java on your server. Add the quest cape ID in the Cape section.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I will use this as an example

if(i == 12342) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 15368; class8.anInt165 = 15367; class8.anInt200 = 15367; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 592; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 323; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset; class8.anInt194 = -1; // model offset; increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon defender"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

I’m sorry, I know where to change them, I just need to know what each line means. Like if(i == 2740) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 107; class8.anInt174 = 4172; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 4194; class8.anInt200 = 7192; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Quest cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its a quest cape".getBytes(); } what all the “class8.*****” means.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I think you can change it server sided but not entirely sure where to go in a delta. Most likely be a file that deals with various items.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Thank you so much, but I need Delta… Well, can I ask you a quick question? There are many items on my server that are worn in the wrong spot… (ex: Quest Cape is worn in the weapon slot) Where do I change the item slot in which an item goes? I know it’s in the class8.java… here take a look:

if(i == 2740) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 107; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 107; class8.anInt174 = 4172; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 4194; class8.anInt200 = 7192; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Quest cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its a quest cape".getBytes(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a teleport option
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

This would be a little different in Delta probably. You will have to figure out where to add as well.
This is in clickingbuttons.java in PI look for something about clicking maybe.

[code]//1st tele option
case 9190:
if (c.teleAction == 1) {
//rock crabs
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3174, 4268, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
//barrows
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
//Not available
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2882, 5309, 2);
} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
//varrock wildy
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3273, 3686, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {//avatar
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2344,3802,0);
}

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2845, 4832, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2786, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2398, 4841, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		case 9191:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//tav dungeon
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2884, 9798, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//pest control
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2662, 2650, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//kbd
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3007, 3849, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				//graveyard
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3164, 3685, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3079,9502,0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3179,9758,0);
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2796, 4818, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2527, 4833, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2464, 4834, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		//3rd tele option	

		case 9192:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//slayer tower
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3428, 3537, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//tzhaar
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2444, 5170, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//dag kings
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2479, 10147, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				//44 portals
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2975, 3873, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2813,3436,0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2515,4632,0);
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2713, 4836, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2162, 4833, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2207, 4836, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		//4th tele option
		case 9193:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//brimhaven dungeon
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2710, 9466, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//duel arena
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3366, 3266, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//Not available
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2525, 4777, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				//Not available
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2539, 4717, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2724,3484,0);
				c.sendMessage("For magic logs, try north of the duel arena.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {
				//gdz
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3247, 9564, 0);
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2660, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				//c.getPA().spellTeleport(2527, 4833, 0); astrals here
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				//c.getPA().spellTeleport(2464, 4834, 0); bloods here
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		//5th tele option
		case 9194:
			if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				//island
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(1653, 5601, 0);
				c.sendMessage("These have 1k hp for the best training !!");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//last minigame spot
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2441,3085, 0);
				c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				//not available
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2344,5196, 0);
				c.sendMessage("Note : Bring a @red@team@red@@blu@he is extremely dangerous !!");
				c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
				//ardy lever
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3518, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2812,3463,1);

} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {
//ice
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2649, 4039, 1);
}
if (c.dialogueAction == 10 || c.dialogueAction == 11) {
c.dialogueId++;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
c.dialogueId = 17;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
}
break;[/code]
